events.message: I am submitting a claim today after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle on the highway.
The claim has been reviewed and correctly categorised under Auto Accident based on the information provided.
An agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to assist with the investigation of this car accident claim.
Your claim has been formally acknowledged, and we are committed to resolving your situation as swiftly as possible.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and medical reports if applicable for further processing.
All requested documents including the police report and photos of the vehicle damage have been submitted for review.
The investigation into the circumstances of the car accident has officially begun to determine liability and damages.
The investigation concluded with clear evidence supporting the validity of the claim and extent of damages.
We have prepared a settlement offer to cover repair costs and related expenses based on the investigation results.
The customer has responded positively, appreciating the quick turnaround and fair settlement proposal.
After review, the claim was officially approved, confirming coverage for the damages sustained in the accident.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued and should arrive in the customer's account within two business days.
The claim case has been closed following successful payment issuance and customer confirmation of receipt.
